title: About
text:

title: About
text:
Lesson plan

Start on: 8th September 2025.
End on: 29th September 2025.
No. of Lectures: 4 (can be adjusted if more is needed)
Lecture time: Monday afternoon (1.15 pm – 4.15 pm).
Type: Online via Zoom
Continuous Assignments: One (1) individual assignment on R programming (this accounts for 10% of the total module marks).
Questions for the exam paper: Two (2) questions (Total 40 marks – 20 marks each)

title: Teaching and Learning Materials
text: These notes contain only the R Programming and Data Analysis portion of LT2010: Data Science for Transport and Logistics Systems.

title: Teaching and Learning Materials
text:
Pre-requisite for TT-Lecture 01
Before the R Programming lecture, please install the following software:

R
RStudio

If you are a Windows user, you will also need to install an additional software package: Rtools.
Click here to view R and RStudio installation guide
To install Rtools

Download Rtools from here https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/

title: Teaching and Learning Materials
text:
